name: Burger Maker-Kids Cooking Game
description:
Fast food fever is back especially for home cooking chef because we bring a world of flavor into your life with the cooking of the most delicious, loved, amazing, juicy Burgers in the culinary world. Test yourself by cooking your own burger by choosing and preparing all the ingredients necessary. Here you can easily grill and cook the burger patty by turning them on the grill. Burger Maker is a wonderful addition in the all known burger story maker games and bakery cooking game where you can learn cooking burger or even school lunch food. Make your own delicious burger and make this a mouth-watering experience with burger maker. Unleash your creativity, choose from a huge selection of ingredients and make the kind of burger you like in the kitchen. Be the best baker & maker the world has ever seen! So what toppings do you like the most Pepperoni, Mushrooms, Onions, Sausage or bacon? We have gathered world best ingredients & recipes in our kitchen to make it happen for you. So grab your aprons and pepperoni, make some amazing burgers as you are a top chef in cooking world who is cooking in the kitchen! With more than 100 food toppings to choose from including veggies, meats, cheeses, herbs, spices & seafood to sure the burger cooking fever. Burger Maker is an absolutely amazing cooking and baking games for girls and kids who love to play maker games.

Cook the most amazing and exciting burgers with the best toppings and flavours and toss it into your master delighting food and serve it. Choose from a variety of toppings, salads, patties, sauces, meat, cheese, and vegetables and transform your burger skills into a sizzling burger. Choose your hamburger meat and grind it up. Then add spices and special ingredients to flavor your patty, make your juicy Burgers with special ingredients including Chicken, beef, mutton, fish, Sauce, Cream, Bacon, Onions, Mushrooms, and cheese. Now it’s time to flip & fry your hamburger patty, but be careful not to burn the burger! Start your day in the kitchen where all food ingredients are placed on the shelf. Experience the true maker & baker environment with real chef. In a large bowl you have to add water, flour, yeast, eggs, olive oil, milk. Mix it well add salt and mix it again.

Features:
- Variety of bread and buns
- Make burgers from scratch, grind up the meat, add & mix the ingredients and make into patties
- Touch & drag to mix up the ingredients for the burger
- Many options for meat including Chicken, mutton, beef and fish
- Variety of salads, meat, cheese, vegetables and spices
- Easy to choose from ingredients, patties, meat, cheese, vegetables!
